trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is a syntax error in XML parsing.
trans-unit.target: XML 剖析時發生語法錯誤時擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: XmlSyntaxException uses the default <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> implementation, which supports reference equality.
trans-unit.target: XmlSyntaxException 會使用預設<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>支援參考相等的實作。</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of XmlSyntaxException, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 XmlSyntaxException 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"Invalid syntax."|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"無效的語法。 「 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with the line number where the exception was detected.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>類別已在偵測到例外狀況的行號。

trans-unit.source: The line number of an XML stream is updated whenever a newline character is detected.
trans-unit.target: 只要偵測到新行字元時，會更新 XML 資料流的行號。

trans-unit.source: Numbering begins with 1 for the first line.
trans-unit.target: 編號從 1 開始的第一行的 1。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"Invalid syntax on line `lineNumber`."|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"無效的語法，在一行上`lineNumber`。 「 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML stream where the XML syntax error was detected.
trans-unit.target: XML 資料流的 XML 語法錯誤偵測到程式碼的行號。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with a specified error message and the line number where the exception was detected.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息與已在偵測到例外狀況的行號。

trans-unit.source: The line number of an XML stream is updated whenever a newline character is detected.
trans-unit.target: 只要偵測到新行字元時，會更新 XML 資料流的行號。

trans-unit.source: Numbering begins with 1 for the first line.
trans-unit.target: 編號從 1 開始的第一行的 1。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"Invalid syntax on line `lineNumber` - `message` "|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|"無效的語法，在一行上`lineNumber` - `message` "|</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML stream where the XML syntax error was detected.
trans-unit.target: XML 資料流的 XML 語法錯誤偵測到程式碼的行號。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.XmlSyntaxException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>.</xref:System.Security.XmlSyntaxException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
